overview: Annie was a sweet, innocent and intellectual college student. That is until she started a science experiment. An experiment that forced her to find a new culture - a part of the American population still unexplained. Witness Annie's eye-bulging results for yourself in the true-life story of her search for man's most-desired creature, the beach babe. Follow Annie as buxom beauties Lexi, Candy and Angelique show off their sun-drenched lifestyle and more in this outrageous and sexy romp in the sand. From strip-clubs and shopping malls to swimming pools and volleyball courts, these three-gorgeous and tanned beauties will teach you the secrets of their long-misunderstood culture in The Beach Babe Experiment.
title: The Beach Babe Experiment
